__e: And I intend to do everything I can to protect it from this world.

If my son is still here, if there's still a part of him standing here in front of me, then he'll put these on willingly and he'll come with me, because he knows I'm here to protect him from himself and from others.
This kid is mine, and the world's a fucking mess and I just wanna... I want to protect him from everything, you know.
You were protecting him. That's why you didn't tell me.
I just wanted to protect him, and for a while, I thought that I could.
And I have killed myself trying to take care of him, to protect him, to keep it a secret.
